long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TabMerge is your ultimate tab organization tool for Chrome. Say goodbye to cluttered tabs and hello to streamlined browsing!

With TabMerge, you can effortlessly manage your tabs by grouping them based on website domains. Simply add the domains you frequently visit along with custom titles, and TabMerge will automatically group your tabs whenever you navigate to those sites.

No more hunting through a sea of tabs to find what you need. TabMerge keeps your browsing experience tidy and efficient, allowing you to focus on what matters most.

Key Features:

Automatic Tab Grouping: Tabs are organized into groups based on website domains.
Customizable Domains: Add, edit, or delete domains and titles as needed.
Streamlined Browsing: Easily navigate between grouped tabs for increased productivity.
Simple and Intuitive: User-friendly interface for seamless tab management.
Experience the power of organized browsing with TabMerge. Install now and take control of your tabs!
